crumbs.text: Provision of the technical and commercial offer

lead.title: Provision of the technical and commercial offer

text: In order to develop cooperation with the companies of the Inter RAO Group, we propose to send information about the products supplied by your company and their cost by filling out the price list, as well as to update it on a quarterly basis.
Information on products and their cost will be used by Inter RAO Group companies when planning procurements, including when forming the initial (maximum) contract price.

items.text: Fill out the application form on the service page
Send a technical and commercial offer to the companies of the Inter RAO group
